ED_Title: Observer status for the Global Environment  Facility in the General Assembly
ED_DecisionText: At its 47th plenary meeting, on 4 December 2024, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the Sixth Committee, (Footnote: A/79/484, para.7.)  decided to defer a decision on the request for observer status for the Global Environment Facility in the Assembly (Footnote: See A/72/195.)  until the eightieth session of the Assembly.
